website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech QuickCam Pro 9000 offers a winning combination of stellar image quality, easy-to-use software, and a sturdy, stable stand. It's our Webcam pick for desktop and laptop users alike.
pros: Carl Zeiss lens and Logitech's RightLight technology combine to deliver superior image quality, especially in low light
2-megapixel sensor lets you shoot video up to 1,600x1,200 resolution
included QuickCam software is polished and easy to use
flexible stand works equally well on top of a monitor or a laptop or resting on a desk
cons: QuickCam software isn't optimized for Macs, so you're left without the audio and video optimization technology and, less importantly, the goofy video effects and filters

customer_reviews.title: not 2 megapixels and grainy pictures
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a webcam. Trying to replace an old microsoft hd webcam that my wife is using with issues with autofocus. Well the autofocus works OK but the camera is not 2 megapixels. That would have been acceptable if it were good quality bu the pictures are grainy compared to the logitech c920 and to the microsoft hd webcam I was trying to replace. The software seems outdated too as there were mentions of windows 7. Instead I have setup my wife to only use manual focusing at least we get good images.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio G. Rey

customer_reviews.title: Camera does not work on MacOS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to replace a 12 year old Logitech C930e. The C930e was an amazing camera and worked perfect on Mac. The only reason I am replacing it is the mechanical parts of the camera are wearing out. It has worked on every mac I have owned since 2010. That was my baseline for the 9000 pro. There are reviews that say the 9000 does work on Mac, but that was not my experience. The 9000 pro does not work correctly on MacOS. MacOS doesn't see the mic correctly, it is labelled generically as "usb mic". The light adjustments are very wrong. The zoom is wrong. I do not recommend this camera for Mac at all.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hildoer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly 7+ years later.
customer_reviews.text: This webcam has lasted me over 7 years with no issues. It is a great, affordable little webcam that grips onto your monitor so that you do not need any stand for it. The visual image is spectacular and the sound quality is good. If I had to buy another webcam, I'd strongly consider this one again, even this many years later!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worst webcam I've used
customer_reviews.text: Would not put out the rated resolution or aspect ratio, horrible noise (static) in the picture is unacceptable even for video calls. Odd shape and poorly designed mount does not attach well to monitor. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Overthere

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The video quality and audio are both great. I use this camera on video conference and I never have any complaints. I hope my review has been helpful to you. It encourages me to continue writing and updating my reviews. Please leave a comment if you have any questions, I will be more than happy to answer if I can be of help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera still works fine and I use it in another room so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product more than 6 years ago at half of what it currently costs. I used it extensively for many years as I work out of my home office frequently and need to connect remotely with clients. It served that purpose well, but a couple years ago I replaced this with a higher resolution camera. This camera still works fine and I use it in another room so I can video chat with my family across the country. I feel I got my money's worth, but I'm not sure I would pay the current asking price for an average webcam, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Nextech84Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 10-Year Old Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a NEW current model webcam . WRONG. I got a repackaged webcam whose CD wouldn't run on my Windows 10 operating system. I was able to download and install the latest 2012 version from Logitech's support. It appears to work now. However, disappointed to have bought an outdated webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Brad P.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE _ GARBAGE - Should be $20
customer_reviews.text: Absolute GARBAGE photo quality. Just absolute JUNK. I am so disappointed. I will have to get another one. I "thought" that spending over $100 would get a decent camera --- I was WRONG.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Got the webcam camera quality is decent better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: Got the webcam camera quality is decent better than my old one, but not by extremely large margins. The software that comes with is interesting such as zoom and face tracking. With windows 10 as my OS the autodetection update the drivers for me and i was in business pretty fast. The microphone in the webcam is better than expected since people say if i had it close to my face it would sound clearer than my harmoniqs pro. would never buy at full retail price but would at a lower one. the webcam settings such as exposure and what not are better off as custom for me anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall: The resolution is good, the camera is easy to use. I'm pleased. The mount is easy to position on your monitor and easy to adjust the angle, and also easy to fold differently to sit on a desk or other surface. Minor drawbacks: The face tracking feature is slow, and only works if you adjust positions rarely. Same with the autofocus. It would stay blurry for large stretches as it tried to catch up. I had better results setting the focus manually for the typical range I sat in. The quality of the microphone is decent, but not excellent. It works in a pinch when I don't want to use my headset while on camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: I still have to master the zoom functions, but my overall impression is positive. For Skype and other conference uses, it does the job well and is worth the few extra dollars over lesser models. The built-in stand results in the camera being placed on a table and producing those unflattering up-the-nostrils views. Mounting it higher produces a more flattering view but draping it over the top of the monitor may not work on some montors. Taping it to the monitor back is more secure.\ As always, kudos to Amazon. After dealing with some other online companies, the Amazon commitment to customer satisfaction continues to be the gold standard of online retail business.
customer_reviews.author: studioprod.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my office a while back and then got one for my home use, too. It's a great camera for video quality. The built in mic worked well for my use, even when the kids are talking at the same time from multiple positions. I also like the software that comes with it, which makes it easy to do things like record video presentations. The light that indicates when a signal is being sent was a nice bonus. The only downside is that it's hard to clamp the camera to many thin monitors or a laptop. It will stay there and is plenty steady enough for video conferencing, but it's possible to knock it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little webcam. The image and video quality are excellent the microphone audio is very good and the software than makes it all work is also very good. It sits nicely on top of any monitor with an innovative mount that works well. The low light performance is excellent and the software offers a face tracking mode that works great. In addition the software does a good job of adjusting for backlit situations - a common problem in the average room that has lighting above or behind the user. I liked these so much I have purchased 4 of them and recommend them to anyone who is looking to add a webcam to their desktop PC.
customer_reviews.author: R. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: video quality not great; light not hardwired
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the light isn't hardwired to the fact that this is turned on. My video recording app even has an option to turn off the light despite the fact that it is recording. I don't like being paranoid about stuff, but come on logitech! The video quality isn't particularly good. It is acceptable, but I guess that's what you get at 2 megapixels. I suppose the sound quality is decent, but to be honest, I haven't double checked that. I've not had issues with people understanding me on the other side of video chat apps (e.g. Skype).
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Finally found some time to write some reviews for products ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally found some time to write some reviews for products I bought on Amazon. I purchased this in 2010 and its still working today! Given that I don't use it often, but when I do, I always receive complements of the video quality. I recall Skyping with my family when they were in China and they were sooo pixelated. I think people have just gotten used to using the front-facing camera built into most laptops that they don't want to invest in a quality webcam. I have no regrets making this purchase. Video is smooth, clear and in HD.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfred

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I love being able to see my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I love being able to see my wife clearly while I am out of town. It seems to work well on multiple platforms. I have used it with a windows laptop and a windows desktop. It works well with Google Hangouts and with Facebook Messenger. I plan to try it out with a few changes in the settings to see what will work best with the video chat I decide to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Best webcam I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This webcam is awesome. I use it weekly so that my two year old can talk to her grandparents who live in another state. Images are always sharp and well balanced despite non-ideal video conditions (dark room with harsh lighting). I liked it so much I bought one for my parents to replace thier Microsoft branded cam that was really lacking on clairty. They can now read her books and show her the pictures and there is no distortion at all. Its like they are just on the other side of the monitor. The audio is also very clear. My daughter and parents love it, and i coudln't be happier. Google's video chat is also partially responsible ;-). Excellent webcam!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Greet Webcam!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a nice-looking, easy to use, reasonably priced camera for your PC or laptop? Search no further, for you have found it! This camera not only shows you, sitting at your computer, and of course, your friend, if he/she has one, too. It also has a "radar" that, when activated by simply clicking on its middle button, silently and unobtrusively videotapes you or anyone else who happens to come within the webcam's lens. Then, when you open the "Logitech Vid" program, you will see those videos. There could be many, depending on how many times someone was within the webcam's area. Combine your webcam video with a song and you're a star!
customer_reviews.author: DJDude4244

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this webcam so my parents could Skype with us and see their grandson. Mission accomplished. We've been told the built in microphone works great. The picture I see of myself in the corner of the screen looks crisp and clear with enough fps that movement doesn't look weird. Our internet connection speed and my parents internet connection speed aren't high enough to stream a very nice picture, but they are happy with what they can see. I bought a Logitech because I trust the brand and I haven't been let down. It sits nicely on top of our monitor, didn't require jumping through any hoops to get it set up in Win 7 64
customer_reviews.author: B. Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: good value and good performance
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera for web and computer use. The autofocus is excellent. The light sensitivity, and its responses to changes in light, are outstanding. The picture quality is first rate. The camera is easy to configure, physically set up and operate and it lends itself well to webcam and videoconferencing uses. Sound quality with the built-in mike is clear. The software isn't all that great, but this little camera works well with Skype and other programs (Skype seems to get very good performance out of this camera). Highly recommend to those who need a small, hi-quality and adaptable webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Pros good picture quality depending on your internet connection sturdy easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this webcam for over 6 years. Its a solid webcam and it has lived up to to its reviews. Pros good picture quality depending on your internet connection sturdy easy set up autozoom Cons hinge to secure it on the monitor could have been better No HD but quality is good enough wish it had improved lightening sensor for darker rooms Summary: overall i would recommend this product to for anyone looking for good webcam
customer_reviews.author: xavr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Web Cam
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this web cam to access a popular VOIP site (Skype) so I could communicate with a family member who is working abroad. So far the camera has lived up to my expectations. The quality of the images and sound using the built-in microphone are very good. It works well under varying light conditions. The auto-focus sometimes takes longer to adjust that I would like. Installation was easy, but the supplied documentation could have been more detailed (e.g., describing how to mount it on the monitor). I would buy this model again, and I would recommend it to anyone needing a quality web cam.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest of quality and it wobbles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my laptop and to be used with skype. I found that the part of the camera to balance the camera was not very good in keeping it still or from rocking around. When using it with my laptop you can not move the laptop with this on it because it is not secured, just kinda floating there. The video quality is fine but the still pictures leave something to be desired. I would only recommend this for people who need a cheap webcam but if you can afford it get the HD version and something that can be secured to the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We got this web cam for inlaws who are not really computer savvy but wanted to better communicate with parents in another state. I'm not a computer genius, either, but installation was easy and fast plus picture quality was reported as excellent by recipients. I have received skype calls from others with cheaper cameras and although picture quality was ok I was happy to hear that this one provided great quality. I doubt if all the features of this item will ever be used but so far everyone skyping with it is very happy. Pricier than most but you get what you pay for in this case in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Old Gare

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and get rolling with. The picture is excellent quality. I don't feel the face tracking is up to par. The camera is always adjusting itself even if you are sitting still. Never seems to 'sit still' for more than a few seconds so usually I just leave it off. The supplied software with drivers is easy to install and has plenty of features and gadgetry to keep you busy if you are a gadget freak. The camera fits nicely over the top of my LCD monitor and is very study construction wise. I would buy this model again with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars based on packaging.............NOT THE WEBCAM ITSELF!
customer_reviews.text: This webcam will be a 2012 Christmas present for my son so we have not used it yet. Although all the contents seem to be intact in a sealed plastic bag, it did not come in a Logitech (brand) package. It's just the contents of the package in a sealed bag. I am guessing this is Amazon's "Frustration Free package Design". I did not choose this version, nor does it show anything different on the screen when you do choose it. I would have liked it to be in the original box since it will be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony from Orlando FL

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I never used a webcam before, but since our granddaughter got deployed to Iraq we decided it would be good to have one. Even if she can't find a fast internet connection, we can still send her messages, etc. It installed easily, and worked perfectly right away. I should mention that I got fed up with my (relatively) new VISTA computer, so I took it to the local guru, got it wiped, and had a brand-new Windows XP installed. Oh joy...everything works perfectly now! Hey folks, we don't have to put up with Vista....win xp is far better. Anyway, the webcam likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Microsoft VX-3000 that never did work good, it's brightness was poor (too dark), then the microphone gave out within a week. Returned it to Amazon and purchased the Logitech Pro 9000. This Pro 9000 is a dream to use with its auto focus and auto light adjust and a built-in microphone that is clear with no noise or echo. I even use it as an "electronic microscope" by setting the lens about 2 inches from something, set it to manual focus and zooming in all the way. Doing this I was able to see microscopic insects crawling around on the leaf of a dahlia plant that was not doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Neroos

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought I'd go for a cheaper Web cam, but I was advised to get this one by someone who has worked with it for a long time and loves it. And, actually, the price is reasonable when you think of the value. It set up very quickly and is easy to use. The photo/video images are clear. I'm more than satisfied with this product. I would recommend it to anyone. Pay a little more and get a good piece of equipment. Since I haven't owned it for long, I can't personally swear to its durability, but according to the recommendation I received, that's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: EVMagick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Webcam for anyone, really!
customer_reviews.text: So if you need a webcam, STOP looking for another. YOU FOUND IT RIGHT HERE! Plug it in download the CD and your done. That easy, anyone can do it. Really ANYONE. I sent this to my mother that has NO computer training nor does she want any. She got it set up in a matter of 20 mins. Most of that time was download time. GREAT picture with some cool settings. Thanks Logitech for making it so easy to talk with my mother long distance and see her. My daughter can now talk to her grandmother in another state. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carl F. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for 70 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent. Simple to use software. I have not use it on yahoo messenger yet but its a bit slow. its not bad but just that, i give it 98 percent. I was hoping a fluid movement like the regular expensive portable video camera but lets keep it real...its a webcam. Overall for the value and performance..this is in deed the one to purchase. this cam is getting popular and as such in high demand, amazon has increase the price. just like when i bought my LN40A650. high demand..price increased today. Will update more when i start to use it in full force
customer_reviews.author: 2020 R1M Or Ducati V4S ??

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've used
customer_reviews.text: We've have tried other cheaper highly rated webcams, but this one beats them all. Spend the extra dollars for this one and you won't be disappointed. It can be set to follow you as you move. Also my kids love the extra software feature that turns you into various cartoon characters that will blink their eyes when you do, move their mouth when you speak, and move their head when you do. It does all this plus it has better video and sound than the others we've tried. This is the one to buy to use with Skype and other computer video needs.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Hill Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Works well with Skype and has it's own program as well, though haven't used it. Built-in microphone also works well. Voice quality is very good. Picture quality is also quite good. My only misgiving is that it doesn't really attach well to my screen. It's just sort of propped or lying on top of it and doesn't seem very secure. Hasn't been a big issue because this is on a desktop computer screen that really isn't moved around much. But somehow I though it would clip on a bit more securely. Overall good though for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Connor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent webcam
customer_reviews.text: Top-of-the-line webcam. Works great! Only issue is the potential lock-ups on Windows shut down (logitech software and/or skype software). Also had to change multiple settings on logitech and skype software to stop software from loading at Windows start up (relatively easy to do). However, these negative aspects are inherent to any new piece of hardware/software these days, so I don't take them into consideration -- just want to advise. Consider your internet bandwidth limitations with any webcam, especially a great one like this -- high quality video & voice need high bandwidth (both on your end and on the other person's end).
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: works good, simple, no problems
customer_reviews.text: This is not a detailed review. I bought the camera. Installed it with no problem. Has been working with no problem. Completely simple. I'm happy with it. To my surprise I like the fact that it just hangs on my laptop screen (no clamp) and can be used hand held. I use it mostly for video calls with Skype. I can pick up the camera and point it different places. I read stories to my grandaughter with it, pointing it to the pictures in the book. I can also walk around carrying my laptop (wireless connection to internet) and show pictures of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Huck J. Rorick

customer_reviews.title: Works fine except for weird Thunderbird interaction (with work-around)
customer_reviews.text: Setup in XP was easy and it worked immediately with Skype. Picture quality seems good (but this is my first webcam, so I cannot compare to others). One problem: for some weird reason, the software prevents Thunderbird from updating itself, so if you use the Thunderbird mailer, you must terminate all webcam processes (including the little icon in the system tray) before doing mailer software updates. This procedure is annoying but not difficult. If the webcam software is running, Thunderbird updates get stuck in an infinite loop. Only in Windows could two apparently unrelated programs interfere like this!
customer_reviews.author: Xman

customer_reviews.title: great HD webcam for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is the desktop model that Google free videoconference uses as a reference/recommendation. on Oovoo, Skype, and Gmail videoconferencing, i always get compliments as to the picture quality. Microphone is also very good. Compatability with Windows 7 can be tricky sometimes, but i blame the OS for that. as soon as the red circle lights up, i know i'm good to go. the software has amusing video 'masks' that can only be used with other Logitech webcam owners. overall highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Block Knight!

customer_reviews.title: The worthwhile addition when you don't have the features built into your system...
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice addition for my old bare bones desktop. It gave me an industry standard capability supported by SKYPE that had both a better microphone and 2.0 meg video output to a USB 2.0 port on the computer. The clip works OK with my Samsung SyncMaster 206bw flat screen monitor. Unfortunately, my wife, who uses the computer now, does not like the idea that someone could "see her" through it and it now sits unplugged in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: The Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Best Webcam Compared to Everything else - but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great image quality, easy to use, fun tricks/tools, great sound pick-up Cons: Image is still choppy/blurry if you move fast, if you have a laptop you have to take if off the monitor every time you shutdown, not very stable standing on it's own, the avatar feature is hit-or-miss, Overall it's a great camera! My dad bought the Philips camera I was looking at (that has 90 frames per second) and the image quality was horrible. He's returning it and buying the Logitech Pro 9000. I love it and it gets the job done. Now I just need my other friends to buy one. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: S. McCalister

customer_reviews.title: Very nice web cam only one downfall
customer_reviews.text: This was my first web cam and i have to say it is well made, easy to set up and works very well. one thing i noticed which i still may solve i havent completely went through all the details yet but it doesnt give you a mirror image on the screen it gives you the picture as if you were looking at yourself or what a person would see if they were looking at you. i mean hey thats pretty cool but i would want to be able to change that to a mirror image and i didnt find a way to do that yet. aside from that small inconvenience this camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Beni Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I should have made the purchase earlier
customer_reviews.text: In today's world with family often living miles from each other, this video option is a good way to keep in touch. What's that old saying? "A picture is worth a thousand words." I have 8 grand-dtgs from the pacific northwest to Florida to the Texas gulf coast. Grandma Judy is now only a click away. Such a joy to see and hear little people who grow up so fast. It was my Christmas gift to these dear families. I would prefer to hug and hold but for now this is the best we can do. I am grateful for the technology. Who would have thought?
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam for Windows 7 and Mac
customer_reviews.text: I've used it with my Windows 7 laptop and my Mac mini. Works great with both. Great in low light. Everyone I Skype with complements my image quality and sound. The only snags I had were that I installed the software off the cd and that completely froze my Windows box and never worked well. I uninstalled the software and went to the logitech website and installed it from there and no problems. No drivers for Mac which means all the nice features that come with the software are not available, but quality image nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Great 2.0MP webcam
customer_reviews.text: This webcam is definitely the best webcam that I have ever used. The picture quality and fps is very good. The software is very easy and not intrusive once you set some settings. I usually don't use manufacturer's software but I definitely recommend that anyone using this webcam should use the software. The webcam's microphone has a very good noise cancelling feature that is most likely software-based but it definitely works very well. I can speak into the microphone with a loud fan spinning nearby and not have to worry about it being picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Webcam Pro 9000
customer_reviews.text: Logitech Webcam Pro 9000 is the top of the line webcam available. I bought it to use mostly with Skype for video phone. I spent hours to research for a good webcam and I finally found the best at a good price on Amazon.com. This camera has autofocus and works with a wide range of lighting intensity; in low light at night to bright daylight. Pictures can be taken upto 8 MP and video could be taken at a higher resolution. Works flawlessly with Skype but I do not know how it would work with other Video-Conferencing sofware.Buying products from Amazon.com has always been a good experience to me.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnAllen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It gives a good sharp picture though I thought it would give a wider angle than it actually did. The way it sits on the edge of the laptop screen is a little funky and I was wishing that there were other ways to hold the camera, like on a mic stand or some other stand-alone prop. Overall, I have been fairly happy with the purchase (yes, damned by faint praise)
customer_reviews.author: Laurence A. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this web cam. It was recommended to me by someone who has used several different web cams including a more recent model from the same company, and he found this to be the best. The built-in microphone transmits clearly and there are multiple settings and adjustments that can be easily made using the software to ensure a clear, balanced image. It is a lot of fun to work with. I have not tried making a video or using the still camera feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: HighDesertDiva

customer_reviews.title: not quite as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: this cam does not really function all that well on either yahoo or windows live and I noticed the much cheapers cams my friends used worked as good and mostly better than mine. Is ok I guess, if you dont mind having to constantly keep changing the settings for optimum viewing, instead of either putting on automatic or finding good settings and keeping them. Not a bad camera but I was hoping for more based on what I had read before buying it....I feel I should have bought one of the ones half this price is all.....so so
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product about 2 years ago, as ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about 2 years ago, as I had a security system set up using my desktop computer and wanted something for my room that was small and had camera quality. I was honestly BLOWN away with how well it worked. And to this day, even though I do not have that security set up anywhere because I moved around a few times, I still have the product and his has help up very well going from NY to CA to CO. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Webcam
customer_reviews.text: This is the first webcam I have used. I was told about it by a computer expert and then read online reviews. Everyone said it was a great webcam. I agree. It was easy to set up and it is easy to use. The Vid software that allows video conversations works wonderfully and is also simple to use. I also bought a less expensive Logitech Webcam for a relative and found that webcam also works well, though this higher end model has added features and the picture quality is better. The frustration free packaging provided by Amazon was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Tom of Normandy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic web camera - theres a reason it's highly rated!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews for the best webcam on [...], Consumer Reports and [...], I bit the bullet and purchased this camera. I couldn't be more thrilled! The picture quality is perfect, theres a mechanism that automatically adjusts the lighting (which is great for darker lit rooms), and the sound is crystal clear. The glass lens on the camera makes a big difference in quality. Set up is super easy and self explanatory, and it's great for laptop use. I highly recommend this to anyone that wants to touch base with family and friends in the best and clearest way possible!
customer_reviews.author: DanielleWY

customer_reviews.title: Great Web Cam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Camera, however, my 4 month old puppy chewed on the cord and now the camera does not work anymore.I have to replace it, since the cable can not be replaced by itself. I never used the build in microphone - for some reason I could not get it to work. But then again, I'm at times technacially challenged. So I used my headset instead. The picture quality was really good and even in a low light setting it was still good. I'm ordering another logitech, but a newer version. Lets see how this one will work :-)
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement - easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an older IBM webcam and use it on my newer Dell laptop with built-in camera also. The people i have conversation with on Skype have told me the picture clarity is a major improvement over the previous two cameras. The installation was straightforward and only took a few minutes. Skype and other programs recognized the camera immediately. There was very little need for set-up. It was the glowing reviews I've read on this site and others that convinced me to buy this model. I'm very satisfied with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: OLD Tech from 2010
customer_reviews.text: Seriously Amazon.... I returned it... My bad for not researching well before I hit the buy now button.
customer_reviews.author: brown

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding videao & audio
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Pro 9000 for several months now. The audio and video quality are vastly superior to other webcams I have seen and used. I have primarily used the webcam with Skype and ooVoo. I have the best looking video in the conference rooms. I've received a lot of "you sound great" or "your video looks great" from people on the other end. You can't beat this webcam for the price. From a technical point of view I have used the webcam on both a Vista Ultimate 64 PC and a PC running Windows 7. Very easy. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Scheinblum

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but a few warnings
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the camera and mic are integrated, so you don't need to buy a separate headset. Sound is a little hollow, but that may be a problem with the acoustics of the room and not the mic quality. Camera is sharp, but turn off the RightLight option since it definitely drags down the framerate. Didn't try out any of the included software (why would you want to use any of it, looks like it would drag down the framerate as well). Picked this up for Skype but didn't read the full requirements for high quality video: d'oh, you need a dual core processor too (edit: for Skype HQ, not for the camera itself).
customer_reviews.author: J. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and high-quality video
customer_reviews.text: Not too much needs to be said. This product is a snap. It basically self-installs, and it can be mounted on any monitor with the flexible arm on the back. It's small and portable, yet it delivers better audio/video than anything else I've tried. It responds especially well to changing light conditions. Bought my first one a few years ago. Just bought a new one this year, plus gave two as gifts. It's a champ.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Gastil

customer_reviews.title: A Video Cam well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This webcam was bought solely on the recommendations found here on Amazon. It turned out to completely fulfill every claim made of it. I Cannot comment on any other product. I'm thoroughly satisfied with its capabilities: clear, virtually noise-free audio, exceptional video clarity, ease of use, versatile means of locating cam itself. Have used it successfully with friends either with WinXP-toWinXP or with WinXP-to-MacOS, using it with AOL AIM-6 as well as Logitech's 'Vid' software. Have been using unit for several months with never a problem. very pleased and highly recommended. Additionally, the cam was received in the usual swift manner for which Amazon is well known.
customer_reviews.author: Roger T.

customer_reviews.title: Still the Best
customer_reviews.text: This webcam is still the best webcam on the market even after being on the market for several years. The image quality is great and settings allow a good amount flexibility. Amazon offers one of the best prices you'll find for this product. Make sure you download the latest Logitech Vid software package. Also, one thing to keep in mind is that the AUTOMATIC RightLight technology works very well but it will significantly lower the framerate. I would recommend disabling the setting in most cases but using it as a general guide for tweaking the manual display settings.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Techy

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Webcam Pro 9000
customer_reviews.text: There are many resolution adjustable features. The audio and sound is very good. Very good usable and fun app features. The camera video picture quality appears to be very clear to receiver or your caller. The camera picture movements are smooth, clear and not jerky. There were no noticeable differences in video picture quality from a caller or my view of a caller if they did not have a high quality webcam. Needs better low light technology and coloring. Overall a very good webcam.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great for Skype and Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use on a desktop monitor With Windows software.
customer_reviews.author: JayElkes

customer_reviews.title: LOGITECH PRO WEBCAM
customer_reviews.text: It works fairly well and the image is very clear which is a +.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these for my wife about six months ago. Recently I needed something similar for work to be able to do video conferencing with some clients in South America. Using the logitech camera with Skype, the video and audio is great and couldn't be easier to set up. I still use XP pro at the office and my wife uses Windows 7 and it works great with no connection or software problems for either one. My wife uses her's for video filming and it works great with 3rd party software as well. For the price it is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality and sound is good.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the picture quality of this thing. it was so much better than the laptop's built-in one. It does help to get some really bright lights. regular incandescent bulbs make things look a little yellow. 6500k fluorescent bulbs make things look a little bluish, and the 5000k bulbs give a great bright white look. The camera has a lot of auto-adjusting feature and having a good 5000k bulb will allow you to turn it off for even better video motion and larger size if you want those. but the auto-adjusting works great. just plug and go!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but XP Audio Issues
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is superb, but I've been having audio configuration issues with the webcam. It has a built-in USB mic and when you install your system with the defaults, the microphone settings in XP become problematic. The app assumes it is the only mic in the system. Consequently, I lost all mic inputs and would have to reboot to correct it. I found that removing the app from the system tray helps. Nice webcam, but I hope they improve this mic integration issue. Better yet, it would be nice to install it with video only!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Masters

customer_reviews.title: logitech king of webcams
customer_reviews.text: Logitech is still King of webcams! I bought this camera back in 2008 and still use it to this day. It works perfectly. Never have problems with it. The picture is clear, it works like a dream in low light - it never fails. I can't say enough good about this camera. I kinda want to buy another one but I don't need it. I will research to see whether Logitech has one that is wireless now...
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: docomentation and software for windows only
customer_reviews.text: All documentation and enclosed software are for windows only. I have a mac. I tried to find mac versions in the logitec site but couldn't find any. Therefore I return the product
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: 13 year old product
customer_reviews.text: This is not an HD camera. I should have researched this before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture and Sound
customer_reviews.text: This webcam provides excellent quality video and sound with it's built-in microphone. The video can be HD and when transmitted during a Skype call appears to be close to HD. The software includes auto-tracking and auto-focus and a variety of amusing avatars that reproduce movements of the mouth and eyes. I was surprised by how easy the webcam was to install, set-up, and use with programs such as Skype. After discounts and rebates, this $100 unit ended up costing less than $60. An excellent buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ELinNM

customer_reviews.title: A good webcam
customer_reviews.text: This camera raises the bar for webcams (not very hard!). It has good color, very good light sensitivity, and good resolution. It works well in a high contrast setting, like a bright light in a normal room, and still shows faces clearly. Of course the image quality isn't as good as a real digital camera but it is a webcam after all. The software is quite sophisticated and has some cute features which are fun even though they don't work 100% of the time. It's the best webcam on the market right now and fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Vince M.

customer_reviews.title: 2009 for a laptop that didn't have a Webcam and it worked great its 2016 and my webcam in my laptop went ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this product in March 9, 2009 for a laptop that didn't have a Webcam and it worked great its 2016 and my webcam in my laptop went out, pull this out of storage and it still going and doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Skype recognizes this video cam, but has a problem with the microphone part, the right side of the Pro 9000 device. To use the microphone I have to unplug and replug this Pro 9000 into my computer USB port every time I start up. My computer remembers the webcam but not the microphone, at least with Skype. Logitech send me a long list of instructions to correct this problem, many hoops to jump through. Result? Same old problem. I would not buy this webcam/microphone again, huge pain in the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Customer FD

customer_reviews.title: Good for Skype, problems with updates
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for Skype video phone calls. The software CD that came with the camera allowed me to set very high resolutions. Although the installed seemed to check for updates at the time of install and said no updates were available, the day after I had a popup message saying an update was available. I accepted the 100 MB+ update, and found that it removed all of the high resolution options for the camera. I uninstalled the software and returned to the original drivers. Works great for Skype. The included Logitech Vid is lame since it doesn't have any echo cancellation and I got terrible feedback loops when I tested it.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for Skyping. It does a great job in all light levels with good color rendition and a sharp image. The microphone works very well, quite sensitive. The mounting system is effective for laptops or flat panels. The camera is capable of fairly high resolution for video recording, but seems kind of slow showing signs of smearing on pans or movement. The auto focus, auto exposure, and auto color balance do a good job making the cam easy to use. The only negative is the cord is quite long which leaves a lot of extra cable on a laptop. If you are using a desk top, this might be a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: We have parents and siblings in europe, and we want to see the children and grand children. Skype and other services work well but if you don't have a camera why look at grainy shadowy video, the grandparents definitely say they can see our kids better then my sisters, this one was a bit more but in the poor lighting of the playroom or the outdoors it works well and has lasted over 2 years with out a problem
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Webcam Pro 9000 Review
customer_reviews.text: The webcam was very easy to setup and install. It functions well but keep this in mind. This is not like watching TV. With ADSL "high speed" connection there will be considerable blurring & pixelation when the subject moves - - even slowly. The solution to this, of course, is to have a faster cable or T1 line. Also, I wish that the camera had a cord that was at least twice as long so that, when installed on a desk top computer, you could still move it to different locations.
customer_reviews.author: G. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: As advertised... works great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the webcam for 2 days and I couldn't be happier. I've experienced none of the Vista issues listed in some reviews... maybe attributable to updates to the Logitech drivers since the issues occurred for the others... maybe since my Vista install is completely up to date via Windows update... I don't know. Great clarity and video quality, microphone performance, secure mounting on my Samsung 2253LW LCD display. Using this for Skype and it works great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: R. Niederhoffer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, works well with Skype
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the camera to chat with my sister and her young kids - really cool way to keep the family in touch, highly recommended. The video quality is really impressive (this model allows for "HQ" resolution with Skype which is noticeably better than other cameras). If you're thinking about one of the $40-50 versions, reconsider and pay a few extra bucks for the 9000. The software that Logitech has you install is a little kludgey and doesn't play all that well with Skype now and then. Not sure where to point the finger...
customer_reviews.author: C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have several and have been buying these for years now - and if ever I need another I would purchase this again. Audio and visual work perfectly. Use the audio for Cortana and voice-input for Google searches ([...], then Ctrl+. and speak). Excellent Product. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtabula

customer_reviews.title: First Time User
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any reference to compare this to except Logitech's reputation. It's the first webcam I've owned and after a year now I have had no issues. Picture Quality is good, easy to set up, and what's more important is my wife can use it with ease. First and only install was on Windows 7. The install was simple and only took a few minutes. I'm sure there's a better Webcam since I purchased this one, but for what it's worth, I'm happy this one.
customer_reviews.author: kboy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best webcams you can get from Logitech.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best webcams. Clear sound and excellent quality picture will improve communication over Skype or other messenger. Carl Zeiss lens is the best choice regardless of the purpose the lens is intended for. If I need another webcam again, I would buy the same one (or its current version). Particularly love the way the camera is attached to the top of the monitor. Highly recommended gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Webcam Software v1.1 Windows 7 64 bit issue
customer_reviews.text: This may be a first-rate, brand new camera but the software provided apparently continues to be a long term issue as of 12/7/2011. Have a Dell 435/9000 with Windows 7 64 bit. Upon attempting install, software shows not compatible. Navigating the solution is not how you will want to spend your life moments. Some day Logitech might get software that prompts updates and auto-fixes.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Kettler

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a good camara based on the price. However i have run into several problems with it. First the Software would not install. It would stop mid way on instalation. After several trys i finally went to there website to see if it was something with the cd. When i downloaded there software trough there web site it worked for my Windows xp pc. Secondly if you move around to quickly the video becomes blurry. There is a feature in the logitech software for motion compensation but it's only for a limited time and you can't record during that time. I recomend you purchased something more inexpensive and worth it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best of the ones I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start off by saying that I first tried thetwo times and while the picture quality was good, there was a serious issue with the auto-focus being over-zealous. This camera has close to, if not comparable video image quality and none of the auto-focus troubles so I'm very happy with this purchase. The only knock on it is the stand... it's really kind of difficult to use without using something else to weigh it down or something similar... But still, overall, great web cam!
customer_reviews.author: J. Shariat

customer_reviews.title: Great little cam for laptop or desktop
customer_reviews.text: Great little cam. Really good picture quality, and doesn't use too many resources even at high resolutions. Easy to install and use the software, and the extras (the images filters, masks, etc.) make using it fun, with both children and the young at heart. We've purchased over a dozen of these now for work to have meetings with remote staff, and they work great. The only thing I would improve would be the stand. It's a little hard to get the cam to balance on top of some monitors, and there's no way to tilt the cam without holding it in your hand (there's no tilt swivel on the stand). Otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this webcam! It's so easy to set up. I have it plugged into my monitor's USB ports, and it works pretty good. The only reason for four stars is for some reason, I can't use it with Skype. It works on Google Video chat and facebook, but it won't show up for Skype. Not sure if this is something I'm doing wrong or what, but for one reason or another, it has some issues with being hooked up to Skype for me. Will try to update if I'm able to find a fix to the problem.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Mac

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my in-laws who live with us here in the US. They have a slower computer running Windows XP that they use to Skype with their daughter in Moscow, Russia. She says the picture is great and smooth on her end, even though the video card on the computer is not very good too. The ring you can see on the front lights up when it's in operation and the camera sits well on top of their LCD monitor.
customer_reviews.author: In Due Time

customer_reviews.title: Look no further. Great for MAC OS X 10.4 & later.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for more than one month now. Amazing clarity and colors. No need to change any setting. Right Lite technology and autofocus works well. It is pricey compared to other cams but there is no comparison. This is the best webcam available at this time. also, it works with MAC OS X (10.4 and above). MAC USERS can use vision pro for mac but this one is fine too. Both Pro 9000 and Vision Pro for mac will work only with ichat. THEY (BOTH) WILL NOT WORK WITH YAHOO MESSENGER IF YOU HAVE BUILT IN ISIGHT CAMERA.
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: great webcam
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these (one laptop version and one of these) when my husband was commuting to another state for 8 months. We've used them with Skype, and they were very easy to set up initially, and now we just need to plug them in to get started. Now that we've moved, I bought another one for my parents so they can see our three year old. The picture is fairly clear over Skype, and my parents are thrilled about it. I also use the camera to take videos of our child sometimes, too. It's easier than using the camcorder and then transferring to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: cincy mom

customer_reviews.title: First web cams - a good experience overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 Logitech web cams to stay in touch with my children and grandchildren. Two of the web cams installed easily and were up and running within minutes. However I (an IT professional) had a miserable experience getting mine to install even with my virus checker and firewall turned off. The Logitech website did have very good instructions for troubleshooting and resolving the problems. Now that the cameras are all up and running we are thrilled with the quality of the picture and audio. Even with the installation problems I would recommend the product to Friends.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma O

customer_reviews.title: Frustration-Free Packaging = Used Item???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in Amazon's Frustration-Free Packaging. This 'new' product had fingerprints and a number of hairline scratches on the piano-black front. Is FFP Amazon's clever marketing method for reselling returned products? Mine came in a plain corrugated cardboard box, although the Logitech logo was printed on the inside of the box. The camera works fine, and I'm happy with its performance and quality, but I do believe I paid full price for a used product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Honeyager

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I work for a company that makes products that compete with it. I don't personally sell that product line, but I have to say we don't have a cam as cool as this one. One thing you might not know about this camera is that in addition to GREAT quality, it has an amazingly short focal length as well. One time I attached a magnifying loop directly onto the lens of the 9000 and was able to actually take clear pictures with it for macro. The cam also does an INCREDIBLE job of managing low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler B

customer_reviews.title: as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, it works as it's advertised. The image quality, even in low light, is superb. I'm very happy with it. I bought it so that my remote family could see/interact with my new baby and it works well. The only thing that doesn't work as advertised is the special features that give you the ability to use a different avatar. It does not work with any IM client, so I don't even know why they included that software. But that's not something I use, so it doesn't keep me from giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T, Cooker

customer_reviews.title: Tech support was outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50 and I am not saying by how much--but even I got this up and running and I am no where near a techie--I did this because Logitech's customer service is excellent--they stayed with me and answered my questions for days until they directed me back to Verizon who discovered it was the speed of my DSL that was causing the problem--I sent these to all of my kids and we had a web Christmas--this camera is beyond easy to use and set up--again just make sure you have the juice to run it. What fun!
customer_reviews.author: Chica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how excellent the video quality is. I have had some audio problems but do not know if they are attributable to the camera or Skype. There are some very helpful tips in the other reviews and I am going to try downloading software from the website and deleting the software from the disc. But a great webcam and I was so impressed I bought my daughter one so we can communicate across the miles. Highly recommended. I gave it 4 stars but if the audio problems are Skype's fault then I give it 5. Easy to clip to my monitor too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ryman

customer_reviews.title: Great Webcam
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Impressed with the high quality video it transmits, far superior to lower end cameras I have tried. Adjusts well to any lighting condition, makes me look good, I like it. No compatibility problems observed with Vista, or Webex, seems to work well. Logitech has their own software bundle and free sever to host conferencing from, nice benefit, but I almost would have rather installed just the camera driver and let the other applications do the driving. No option for that available. The free use of their server is nice though, just haven't taken advantage of it given my use of existing video application programs.
customer_reviews.author: John Tisdale

customer_reviews.title: Showing its age- not a Windows 10 device.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great camera and served well for several years; decent audio and picture/video quality for the price. However, Logitech is definitely pushing end of life; this camera is apparently not compatible with USB 3.0 ports in Windows 10, which is strange since it worked just fine in those ports in Windows 8/8.1. No recommendation as a replacement, but if you're on Windows 10, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Timm

customer_reviews.title: Impressive video quality - perfect on Vista
customer_reviews.text: Having been on the receiving end of many mediocre webcam images recently, I was startled by the extraordinary quality of this Zeiss lens...as have my Skype contacts. To be able to show enough face detail (big smile) to make a baby smile and laugh 6000 miles away says a lot. The install and function on Vista were flawless. Skype takes full advantage of the camera. Not sure what the differences are between the 9000 and the Quick Cam Pro except perhaps size...both with the same amazing lens. I am a convert to webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring Mind

customer_reviews.title: Great Video - WMV File Format Limits Use
customer_reviews.text: The product is less useful than I hoped because many of my fiends have iPhones and can not read the proprietary Windows WMV file produced by the Logitech camera so I can't send them email vids. WMV is the only file the Logitech camera can produce and I need MPEG or AVI. Not everyone reads email on a computer these days. Otherwise, the video is great. The audio is mediocre with its built in mike. No problems loading and using on Vista 64.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using as a Document Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a document camera for making educational videos. It has nice resolution and a good refresh rate. I had to turn off the autofocus because it kept focusing on my hand rather than the paper or calculator; luckily the driver software makes it easy to do this and adjust the focus to where you need it to be. I installed the optional software and had to immediately remove it due to conflicts with my lecture recording software.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Web Cam
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Quickcam Pro 9000 is a great addition to your computer whether it be a PC or a laptop. It's sleek design sits along the top rather than being an eyeball staring at you! Creepy! I love the aviators that you can use on your face so that people can see you as different characters or with funny accessories on. Never a dull moment. All in all, this is a fun, great, easy to use webcam that anyone who wants more out of a computer chat will love!
customer_reviews.author: Soo

product_meta.title: Logitech Pro 9000 PC Internet Camera Webcam with 2.0-Megapixel Video Resolution and Carl Zeiss Lens Optics
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingFROM THE MANUFACTURER










WHICH WEBCAM IS RIGHT FOR YOU?




ENHANCE YOUR VIDEO CALLING EXPERIENCE WITH GREAT LOGITECH HEADSETS
feature_bullets: The Logitech Webcam Pro 9000 now includes Logitech Vid video calling software. If your webcam does not include Vid, you can download it for free at Logitech.com.
Ultra-smooth AutoFocus with Carl Zeiss lens system for sharper, fluid video
HD video recording and 2-megapixel sensor capture detailed 16 x 9 widescreen videos and up to 2-megapixel photos
RightLight2 Technology adjusts brightness for perfect images, even in dim light
Premium built-in microphone with RightSound Technology for crystal-clear conversations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,143 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
